# HEgis

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/HEgis)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=HEgis)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of HEgis is to prepare GIS data for use in HydroEngie R&D project.

## Installation

You can install HEgis from [github](https://github.com/lhmet/HEgis) with:

``` r
library(devtools)
install_github("lhmet/HEgis")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(HEgis)
## basic example code
```
